page.title: 16EXAMS AND UNIFORM.
page.content: Being at the{end of our third year}at{ {Billinge}we have just chosen our { {options,}that will lead to the{ {external exams.}There are{3}main types of{exam,}the{'0' level}(G.C.E.),the{ {C.S.E}and the{16+}which is almost the same as the G.C.S.E.Each exam is normally taken at the{end}of a{2 year {course.}All the{pupils}at Billinge must{wear}school{uniform.}This consists of a white blouse,a grey skirt,a black, green or grey jumper,white,black or grey socks,black shoes,school tie and blazer for the {girls.}The{boys}wear a white or grey shirt, black trousers, black or grey jumper,school tie and blazer. { Billinge}were one of{5}groups to take part in this survey along with{Wensley {Fold,Griffin}and{Witton Park}Schools and{Mill Hill}Youth and Community {Centre.
